name: uvx-fetch-mcp-config
description: UVX Fetch MCP Server Configuration for Bulgarian-German Learning App

scripts.help: echo 'UVX Fetch MCP Server Configuration' && echo 'Available scripts:' && echo '  test/validate - Validate configuration' && echo '  start - Start the UVX Fetch MCP server' && echo '  status - Check server status' && echo '  stop - Stop the server'
scripts.start: echo 'Starting UVX Fetch MCP server...' && echo 'Server should be started with: uvx-fetch-mcp start'
scripts.status: echo 'Checking UVX Fetch MCP server status...' && echo 'Server status should be checked with: uvx-fetch-mcp status'
scripts.stop: echo 'Stopping UVX Fetch MCP server...' && echo 'Server should be stopped with: uvx-fetch-mcp stop'

author: Bulgarian-German Learning App Team
